clauses.scope_of_services: The Service Provider shall perform the services described in the scope of work.
clauses.deliverables: The Service Provider shall deliver agreed outputs within the specified timelines.
clauses.payment_terms: The Client shall pay service fees as specified in the invoice within 30 days.
clauses.service_levels: The services shall be performed with reasonable skill and care.
clauses.confidentiality: Both parties agree to maintain confidentiality of all shared information.
clauses.intellectual_property: All intellectual property created during the engagement shall belong to the Client unless agreed otherwise.
clauses.termination: Either party may terminate this agreement with 30 days written notice.
clauses.governing_law: This agreement shall be governed by the laws of India.
